name: Spirit in the Mask
description:
Game made for the metroidvania jam. Made by a team of students and alumni from the UCLAN game design course. 

Jordan Spencer - Unreal Generalist
Josh Rawcliffe - Level Design
Tim  Shaw - Level Design
